dict.acceptation: 竞赛；竞争；比得上；参加比赛（或竞赛）；

sent.orig: Non-Compete Agreement: Our standard non-compete agreement must be signed prior to start.
sent.trans: 非竞争协议：我们的标准不具竞争协议必须签订之前开始。

sent.orig: If you want to compete with someone, compete with yourself.
sent.trans: 如果你想同别人竞争，先同自己竞争。

sent.orig: But just as students can compete on tests, tests also can, and in compete.
sent.trans: 但是，就像学生通过测试竞争，测试也在进行着竞争。

sent.orig: Churches compete for new members with the same enthusiasm that companies compete for customers.
sent.trans: 教堂接受新成员的激情不亚于公司招徕新客户。

sent.orig: Pushing them to compete against themselves is the only right way to compete.
sent.trans: 鼓励他们和他们自己竞争是竞争的唯一正确的方式。
